column4: how can i pass a command on boot up? i have an old monitor so i need to manually adjust gamma by doing this xgamma -d :0 -gamma 3.0 everytime i boot my machine, is there somewhere i can place this line to exec at bootup?
where do you suggest i put that xgamma line in my bootmisc.sh? at the very end?
at the end, unless you want to see the boot messages, then it should be in a different file altogether
